Dm_ZO_0007_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>To think something like that could have
taken place beneath Hyrule Castle!

And afterward, you mysteriously awoke on
a sky island...
Dm_ZO_0007_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Happy_01>Ah! Link!<sp:5:1:0> Have you had a chance to visit
Zora's Domain yet?
Dm_ZO_0007_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughL_01>Link! It has been far too long!<sp:5:1:0> I received
word that you had gone missing and was
beside myself with concern.
Dm_ZO_0007_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>Say, Link...


Does it not seem that Princess Zelda's
whereabouts might be related to the
floating sky islands and the ruins?
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_01>If so, perhaps you should go and speak
with our historian Jiahto. <sp:5:0:0>His many years
have blessed him with great wisdom.
It is quite possible that he could provide
you with some useful information.

At present, you should be able to find
Jiahto continuing his investigation at
<clr:0000>Toto Lake<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_01>By the way... I hope you know that I am
truly happy to see you again after such a
long time apart, my dearest friend.
Visit me anytime you like! Your presence
is never anything less than welcome
and appreciated.
Dm_ZO_0007_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Angry_01>I see. <sp:5:1:0>So that filthy sludge is still plaguing
the domain...

<sp:3:0:2:0100>That aside, I am so grateful to hear that
Lady Yona and the others are safe for
the time being.
Thank you for putting my heart at ease,
Link. You are truly an exceptional friend.

<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_00>Now then. <sp:5:1:0>With that concern quelled for
the moment, on to the bigger issue. <sp:5:1:0>My
mind has been racing since we last spoke.
Link, you said that you mysteriously
awoke on a sky island, correct?
Dm_ZO_0007_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>The sky...<sp:5:1:0> Could it be that the sky is the
key to everything after all?
Dm_ZO_0007_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_01>Ah, my apologies. <sp:5:1:0>I have actually been
wondering if those floating sky islands
could be the source of the falling sludge.
That is why I have tasked a Zora historian
with investigating ruin fragments and all
historical documents related to the sky.
Dm_ZO_0007_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:ShidoClench_00>As for me, I am not at liberty to leave this
spot at present, as I am uniquely qualified
to deal with the sludge here.
Dm_ZO_0007_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_01>You see, old friend...<sp:5:1:0> This place is the
source of the water that flows into
Zora's Domain.
That is why I must use my power of water
manipulation <sp:5:1:0>to separate the sludge from
our water in order to clean it.
If I cease, then the sullied water will flow
into our beloved home, and there will be
much pain and suffering.
That is why I cannot afford to leave here,
no matter what.
Dm_ZO_0007_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>Hmm... <sp:5:1:0>It seems tragedy has fallen upon
the whole of the kingdom, then.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Ah, Link! Before I forget...<sp:5:1:0> Have you,
by chance, paid a visit to Zora's Domain?

<snd:Embarrassed_01>I ask because...you see... <sp:5:1:0>I have entrusted
the domain to a Zora of incredible
character. Her name is Lady Yona.
Considering this mess with the sludge, it
is a thorny task, to be sure.<sp:5:0:0> I cannot help
but worry for her safety.
If it is not asking too much, would you
please go and see how she is faring in
these trying times?
Dm_ZO_0007_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>I have completely entrusted the domain to
a Zora of incredible character. <sp:5:0:0>Her name
is Lady Yona.
Considering this mess with the sludge, it
is a thorny task, to be sure.<sp:5:0:0> I cannot help
but worry for her safety.
If it is not asking too much, would you
please go and see how she is faring in
these trying times?
